result.title: Summary of the Rationale and Structure of the Free Electronic Textbook 'Basic Mathematics for AI'
result.introduction: The free electronic textbook 'Basic Mathematics for AI' was developed to address the growing necessity of mathematical knowledge for understanding Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning in the current era of advanced information and communication technologies.
result.main_body: The rationale behind this textbook stems from the recognition that understanding AI has become essential, and mathematical knowledge is no longer an option but a fundamental requirement for comprehending AI. This led mathematicians to take on the role of explaining the necessary mathematical concepts. The structure of the textbook is designed to cover the essential mathematical concepts for understanding AI and Machine Learning, organized into a one- or two-semester volume. It is tailored to the specific context and is offered as a free electronic textbook. Additionally, courses based on this textbook have been established for undergraduate and graduate students from various majors who are interested in the field of AI.
result.conclusion: In summary, the textbook 'Basic Mathematics for AI' was created out of the critical need for mathematical foundations in AI comprehension, providing a structured, adaptable, and accessible resource for students pursuing AI studies.
